permissions: Admins can view all prediction subject gaps. Non-admins can view gaps only for prediction subjects returned by the PredictionSubject policy scope.
validation_notes: Filters are optional. --status must be one of: pending, approved. --gap-type must be one of: actual_vs_walk_away, actual_vs_consensus, walk_away_vs_consensus.

flags.name: --prediction-subject
flags.description: Filter by prediction subject ID. Example: --prediction-subject 123

flags.name: --status
flags.description: Filter by status (pending, approved). Example: --status approved

flags.name: --gap-type
flags.description: Filter by gap type (actual_vs_walk_away, actual_vs_consensus, walk_away_vs_consensus). Example: --gap-type actual_vs_consensus
